structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any violation of any provision of subsections (2), (3), (4), and (5) of KRS 77.235 may be enjoined in a civil action brought by the air pollution control board, the air pollution control officer, or any person aggrieved by such violation.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 420, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 62, effective March 14, 1952.
